meta.title: Come again
meta.author: Nicholas
meta.instructions:
**How to Play**

Fill the 7Ã—7 grid. The letters in the intersections of your answer can be unscrambled to find the hidden word

- Click a square to focus it.
- Type to fill.
- Arrow keys move within the active bar.
- At grid intersections, arrowing across the other direction toggles the active bar.
- Tab / Enter cycles through clues. Shift+Tab goes back.
- Space advances one cell.

clues.h2: Unit of height, for a skyscraper
clues.v1: Natural flight material - most of the time
clues.v2: What geese do when seasons change
